page.title: 07SOUTH NORMANTON 12.00-3.30pm
page.content: At 12.00 the bell goes and we wash our hands and line up for dinner. Then we pick up our knives,forks and spoons and we go to the dinner ladies to ask for dinner and our pudding.We eat our dinners and leave what we can't eat and then go out to play. At 1.15 the bell goes and we start school.In our class room we either do singing,topic,art,games or project groups.After about an hour we have playtime.If it is raining then we stay inside but usually we have to go outside in the cold while the teachers have a nice warm cup of tea or coffee. After playtime we do some more work for an hour.We may end our day either reading a story or playing a game.When the bell finally goes we go to the cloakroom,put on our coats and go home.
